A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What's with all the alleged amateur reviewers here giving this movie 5 stars telling us about the \"refreshing\" new narrative and berating us all for having closed minds? The stupidity of this movie was summed up by a ten year old kid sitting in front of me at the theatre. After the whole rebel army and fleet was wiped out we were told that everything was in fact turning the way of the Alliance. The kid whispered to his Dad\, 'But there are only like\, five of them\". You can fool some of the people some of the time......
